name: Silverlight Wisp

physical_description.appearance: A small orb of pure silvery light that dances through the air, leaving trails of luminescent particles. Its glow pulses in rhythm with its master's heartbeat.
distinguishing_features: Makes soft chiming sounds when excited

abilities.name: Myriel's Navigation
abilities.description: Provides mystical mapping and pathfinding through Myriel's guidance

abilities.name: Danger Illumination
abilities.description: Glows brighter and changes color to warn of approaching threats

abilities.name: Comfort Glow
abilities.description: Emanates soothing light that calms fears and provides emotional support

companion_abilities.manifestation_form: Glowing pathways and color-coded warnings that appear as light patterns in the air

habitat.territorial_behavior: Seeks out those worthy of Myriel's guidance, non-territorial

lore_significance: Silverlight Wisps are among the most common types of Myriel-touched companions. Their ability to provide mystical navigation and emotional support makes them invaluable to adventurers, manifesting Myriel's guidance as visible light patterns that help with wayfinding and danger detection. Their existence provides a lore explanation for enhanced HUD elements and mystical awareness systems.
